alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 10 at 2:07PM MST until March 11 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...The Madison and Beaverhead River Valleys. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing snow will cause periods of significantly reduced visibility, especially this afternoon with heavier bursts of snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates..

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Madison River Valley
